panes.title: Basics
panes.descr: These are the basic actions that are commonly available when navigating within Palitan.

content.descr:
The header is consisted of the left action, title and the right action.
Left action is reserved for the "Menu" button and the Back button.
The title displays the appropriate text that best describe the current page.
Right action is a dynamic list of context-based actions that you can perform in the current page.

The left action in the header contains the "Menu" button which you can use to open the Drawer. The Drawer can be used to navigate between other pages within Palitan which includes pages such as Setttings, About and the Help page.

The Content is reserved to display the actual content of the current page which you can consume. Contents could be read-only or interactive.

Whenever the footer is available, you can swipe horizontally to navigate between tabs.
The footer contains the available tabs in the current page if there's any. This is mainly used in the main page for navigating between Palitan's main functionalities.

panes.title: Bottom Edge
panes.descr:
Palitan supports bottom edge gestures to help you navigate with one hand with ease. Just swipe from either side of the bottom edge and you'll trigger the corresponding actions.
Other elements in the app also adjust their position if you trigger/open them from the bottom edge. See for yourself!

content.descr:
The left bottom edge is reserved to trigger the action(s) in the left side of the header. Currently, this can be the "Menu" button or the "Back" button.
The Drawer adjusts its layout depending on how you opened it - normally or via the bottom edge.

The right bottom edge is reserved to trigger the action(s) in the right side of the header. This can directly trigger the right action, if there's only one available, or it can show you a menu of available context-based actions that are present in the right side of the header.
Tooltips and dialogs adjust their position depending on how you opened them - normally or via the bottom edge.

Swipe from the left bottom edge to go back.
Swipe from the right bottom edge to see all the available Help pages.

Drag this page down until you see the header cover almost half of the page and reach the button at the top.

panes.title: Basics
panes.descr: The main page contains all the most important Palitan functionalities.

content.descr: The Input Box is at the very bottom of the page that is available across all tabs in the main page. You input here the amount that you want to see the conversion to other currencies.
There are currently 3 tabs: Favorites, Convert and Full view). You can navigate between them by using the tab buttons at the bottom or simply by swiping horizontally.

panes.title: Convert Page
panes.descr: This page is the most important page in Palitan. You mainly do the currency conversions in this page. This is the first page shown when you open Palitan.

content.descr: You can see the exchange rate details at the very top of the page. It includes the last update date and the current source fo the data.
The results of the conversion can be seen at the middle of the page. It includes the actual resulting value and the corresponding rate between the selected currencies.

Two currency tumblers are available at the bottom of the page that can be used to select the "Base" and the "Destination" currencies.
A swap button is available between the currency tumblers to swap the "Base" and the "Destination" currencies.
A find button is also available in each tumbler to easily search for a currency.

The following are the actions available:

Add to favorites: Add the currently selected currencies to your favorites.
Swap: Swap the "Base" and the "Destination" currencies
Refresh data: Update exchange rate data from the source. This needs a working internet connection.

panes.title: Favorites
panes.descr: This page contains the list of your favorites

content.descr:
The following are the available actions for each favorite positioned as icons at the right side:

Unfavorite: Deletes the current item from your favorites list.
Swap: Swaps the "Base" and the "Destination" currencies of the current item
Convert this: Sets the currencies in the Convert tab to the currencies of the current item and automatically navigate to the Convert tab.

The following are the actions available:

Add: Display the add dialog for adding new favorites.
Sort: Changes the current sorting rule of your favorites list
Refresh data: Update exchange rate data from the source. This needs a working internet connection.

panes.title: Full View
panes.descr: This page contains all the available currencies with the conversion rate for each calculated from the "Base" currency in the Convert tab and current value in the Input Box.

content.descr:
The following are the available actions for each favorite positioned as icons at the right side:

Swap: Swaps the "Base" and the "Destination" currencies of the current item

The following are the actions available:

Add: Display the add dialog for adding new favorites.
Swap: Swaps the "Base" and the "Destination" currencies for all the items.
Sort: Displays the Sort dialog for changing the sorting rule of the currencies list.
Refresh data: Update exchange rate data from the source. This needs a working internet connection.
